title: Without Excuse, by Werner Gitt [ePub/mobi]
description:
With his co-authors, information scientist Dr Werner Gitt provides the most rigorous and useful definition of information thus far.

He distinguishes this Universal Information (real information) from things often mistakenly called information, and shows how ultimately all biological information comes from God.

Gitt's evangelist heart also shines through this academically rigorous work. The author is Werner Gitt, in cooperation with Bob Compton & Jorge Fernandez.

====================
Paperback: 352 pages
Publisher: Creation Book Publishers; First edition (January 1, 2011)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1921643412
ISBN-13: 978-1921643415
 
http://creation.com/without-excuse
